mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, itemno, itemname, unit, unitprice, num, discount, subtotal, arrearmoney, paymoney, voidmoney, istsxm, organization, createuser, createtime, tcnameid
mapper.insert: insert into KQDS_TREATITEM_TC (SEQ_ID, itemno, itemname, unit, unitprice, num, discount, subtotal, arrearmoney, paymoney, voidmoney, istsxm, organization, createuser, createtime, tcnameid) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voidmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{istsxm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tcnameid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update KQDS_TREATITEM_TC
itemno = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arrearmoney = #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voidmoney = #{voidmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
istsxm = #{istsxm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tcnameid = #{tcnameid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_TREATITEM_TC set itemno = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrearmoney = #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voidmoney = #{voidmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, istsxm = #{istsxm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tcnameid = #{tcnameid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,b.useflag,d.classify FROM KQDS_TREATITEM_TC a LEFT JOIN KQDS_TREATITEM b ON b.treatitemno = a.itemno LEFT JOIN HUDH_YKZZ_DRUGS d ON d.order_no = a.itemno where 1=1 and b.useflag = 0
and ${key} = #{val}
select count(1) from KQDS_TREATITEM_TC where itemno in(#{_parameter})
select count(1) from KQDS_TREATITEM_TC where 1=1 and parentid = #{parentid} and name = #{name} and seq_id != #{seqId}
select count(1) from KQDS_TREATITEM_TC where tcnameid = #{_parameter}

select tcty.name as tctype, tc.name as tcname, tcty.seq_id as tctypeid, tc.seq_id, tc.isopen, p.USER_NAME as createusername from KQDS_TREATITEM_TC_type tc LEFT JOIN KQDS_TREATITEM_TC_type tcty on tc.parentid = tcty.seq_id LEFT JOIN sys_person p on p.SEQ_ID = tc.createuser where 1=1 and tc.parentid !='0'
and tcty.name like '%' + #{tctype} + '%'
and tc.tcname like '%' + #{tcname} + '%'
and tc.organization = #{organization} ORDER BY tc.createtime
select * from KQDS_TREATITEM_TC tc where tcnameid=#{tcnameid}
select * from KQDS_TREATITEM_TC tc where tcnameid=#{_parameter}
select name,seq_id from KQDS_TreatItem_Tc_Type where 1=1 and (createuser =#{createuser} or isopen = 1) and parentid = #{parentid} and (organization = #{organization} or organization = '')
select count(1) from KQDS_TreatItem_Tc_Type where 1=1 and (createuser =#{createuser} or isopen = 1) and parentid = #{parentid} and (organization = #{organization} or organization = '')
select tc.name,tc.seq_id from KQDS_TREATITEM_TC_TYPE tc where 1=1 and (organization = #{_parameter} or organization = '') and parentid='0'
